name: Rogue Stargun
summary: Rogue Stargun is an action-packed space combat sim where you pilot 5 unique starfighters with interactive VR cockpits in a story-driven single player campaign consisting of over 24 unique missions covering both land and space. Designed from the ground up to make full use of physics-based virtual controls, with fully physics based AI enemies, Rogue Stargun is the most immersive standalone VR starfighter sim out there!
